title: Knife, ca. 1865
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Integral. Tapered, curved, pointed blade, notched and engraved swaged upper edge. Rectangular handle cut in geometric facets. Oval terminal with button.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1865.
ca. 1865. steel. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-23.
